settings.content:
d = Inner ring dimension
D = Outer ring dimension
B= Bearing width

settings.text: Discover Precision and Durability with CeramicSpeed's 4-Contact Ball Bearings

settings.content:
Welcome to the future of high-performance bearings! CeramicSpeed is proud to introduce our innovative 4-Contact Ball Bearings, meticulously designed to redefine industry standards and elevate your equipment's performance.

Key Features:

  1. Enhanced Load Distribution:
    Experience unparalleled durability with our 4-Contact Ball Bearings, distributing loads seamlessly across four points. This unique design minimizes stress on individual components, ensuring prolonged bearing life under the most demanding conditions.
  2. Reduced Friction for Superior Efficiency:
    Our bearings incorporate advanced ceramic ball technology, substantially reducing friction. This results in smoother operation, improved efficiency, and reduced energy consumption, making them ideal for applications where precision matters.
  3. Precision Engineering at Its Finest:
    Crafted with precision engineering, CeramicSpeed's 4-Contact Ball Bearings adhere to the highest industry standards. Count on consistent and reliable performance that meets the demands of modern machinery and equipment.
  4. Corrosion Resistance for long bering life:
    Built to withstand harsh environmental conditions, our bearings feature corrosion-resistant properties. This resilience ensures a prolonged lifespan, making them the optimal choice for a wide range of applications.

settings.title: Insulate
settings.content:
Our Insulate products are designed for maximum durability in electrical machines

  • Ceramic balls create an insulation distance off the full ball diameter - your guarantee against current erosion
  • C3 clearance (C4 on request) allows for the normal thermal expansion of motor- / generator shafts
  • Non-friction rubber seals (Type RZ) protect against outside contamination without compromising low-friction running
  • Well proven wide temperature greases ensure long grease life and silent running

settings.title: Corrotec
settings.content:
The Corrotec product group is designed for maximum reliability in wet and otherwise challenging conditions in the food, pharma, and beverage industries.

  • Ceramic balls allow for long service life even when lubrication is challenged by water and other contaminants
  • Stainless steel rings allow survival in moist conditions
  • High-quality friction seals offer maximum protection against particle ingress
  • Material and lubricant combinations all live up to FDA / EN 1935 regulations for incidental food contact

settings.title: Xtreme
settings.content:
CeramicSpeed Xtreme bearings are not optimized against one specific industry but offer an overall more robust solution to several industries. The benefits of combining high-quality steel rings with ceramic balls allow for:

  • Higher rotational speeds
  • Reduced lubrication or even dry running
  • Longer service life in oscillating or start-stop applications
  • Longer service life in contaminated environments
  • Longer service life under extreme temperatures
